page.title: 19COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: We get our local news from The Trader,The Durham Shopper and The Durham advertiser.One of the pupils from our school was in the Durham advertiser with the Landsdowne comprehensive school band, and the headmaster of our school was in the advertiser also. These three newspapers advertise houses,cars,jobs etc."Lookaround"on a Saturday morning tells all the events that are going to happen.You can get Travel News from radio 1 or Ceefax,you can also get weather news.The Northern Echo is our daily newspaper that we get every morning apart from Sundays.On Sundays we can get all the Sunday papers.We get them from outside Crowtree's Working Mens Club.
